constituent: elbow, moon, month, flesh, part of the body, glue
heisigStory: Instead of the familiar "grease" we usually associate with the elbow of someone hard at work, the kanji gives us a part of the body that has been glued to its task.
koohiiStory1: Sometimes I get carried away and do elbow curls until the point where my forearm snaps off! When that happens I simply pull out the glue and re-attach the elbow to my flesh.
koohiiStory2: Picture two Siamese twins glued together at the elbow.
myStory: khủy tay. dùng để đo mặt trăng.
